ygData.subject: Re: Languages and Learning...
ygData.msgSnippet: We could set up a time and place on fenin ro server I want to learn languages. So if there are any other from fenin ro give response. ... From: Lomack
ygData.messageBody:
We could set up a time and place on fenin ro server I want to learn
languages. So if there are any other from fenin ro give response.

-----Original Message-----
From: Lomack <lomack@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, May 21, 1999 12:37 AM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Languages and Learning...


>From: Lomack <lomack@...>
>
>Unfortunately I am not playing on Solusek Ro.
>If anyone wants I propose that we set this up for all shards at this time
>I will come to this same location on Fennin Ro at the same time. that is
>listed below. I'd be happy to give anyone that needs them the languages I
>have acquired. Hopefully someone will have some that I do not already
have.
>
>Someone actually wanted to charge me 100 plat to get me excelent in Old
>Erudin. So far Zero plat investment and I am up to Good, excelent in 11
>others, average in Elder Elvish, and the basics in 9 more.
>
>I await a response.
>
>Lomack
>
>>Message: 9
>> Date: Thu, 20 May 1999 10:49:41 -0400
>> From: "Ken Lee" <kenlee@...>
>>Subject: Re: Languages and Learning...
>>
>>Okay. The best place seems to be the large open area in the tunnel from
>>Ecommons to North Ro. So
>>
>>Date: Saturday May 22nd
>>Time: 2 pm EST
>>Place: Open part of the Tunnel in East Commons.
>>
>>Bring, yourself and anyone else who knows any languages. Evil races
welcome.
>>We're here for knowledge. If you don't want to know T'ier Dal, don't
listen.
>>: )
>>
>>We'll be forming up in groups depending on how many people are there, I've
>>found that setting up a hotkey to
>>
>>/g I'm speaking another language, understand?
>>
>>works the best. You can click the mouse faster than hitting the keyboard,
>>and it's not as tiring.
>>Anyone think I should email the new sites to post up about the meeting?
>>
>>Zalbar
>>18th Wizard
>>Solusek Ro
>>
>>
>>
>
